cards.title: Ice Cream Social
cards.body: Come to the Ice Cream Social in the first floor kitchen!

cards.title: New Hire: Goose
cards.body: This is Goose, he is a new hire.  His skills include laying golden eggs and writing on chalkboards.

cards.title: Fun at the offsite!
cards.body: Were there water slides at the offsite? Not sure! Here's one anyway.
